features: OUTDOOR INSPIRED SCENTS: Moisturize the manly way with sandalwood and vetiver that’ll leave you smelling woodsy with a spicy hint of citrus.
LIGHTWEIGHT AND NON-GREASY: Lightweight and fast absorbing means you’ll feel moisturized in a flash and without any lingering grease.
GREAT FOR EVERY SKIN TYPE: Give your skin a break from the action with our completely Hypoallergenic and Non-Irritating formula made with naturally derived ingredients.
NATURALLY DERIVED INGREDIENTS: Made with ingredients like Aloe Vera, Coconut Oil, and Cocoa Butter. We took Mother Nature’s MVP lineup and put them all in one bottle.
MADE FOR MEN: 5 million men and counting use Every Man Jack for the scent, the hydration, and the fact that it’s made responsibly in the USA.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HAIR Shop coconut-derived men’s shampoo and conditioner and superior styling products to help locks of any length or type look and feel better, naturally. BODY These skin-safe body washes and bars deliver an unreal clean with scents inspired by the best that nature can offer. SKIN From anti-aging to daily care, our collection of skin care for men targets common skin concerns with the highest quality ingredients available. BEARD Take your beard growth to new levels, naturally. Explore our collection of hydrating beard oils, nourishing beard balms & beard styling butters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a little goes a long way, smells great
reviews.reviewText: smell wise, this mainly smells like your typical shea butter, with a hint of coconut, and just a slight woodsy undertone, it's a very warm smell, and it kind of gives you that warm feel. you dont need a lot either, it spreads easily and it's better to use less so you dont get that greasy/oily feel. this absorbs very well and doesnt take long to stop feeling that lotion feel. while it does absorb well, i still prefer to use it when im getting ready to relax in bed, since i'd still rather not get anything on my main pc mouse/controller.this moisturizes just alright, again, i dont use too much since i dont like the greasy feeling of lotion, but it seems to work well enough without making me feel super greasy because it's "overly hydrating". it's only been about a week of use, but it's helped my dry, cracking hands from this cold and dry weather and has kept things decently soft. not the biggest fan of most lotions, but this seems to work well and i like that it doesnt feel like it weighs you down, plus the smell is pretty tame and smells comfy/warm, which im a huge fan of, since most almost feel the need to really remind you you have lotion on with an overpowering smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strong fragrance, dispenses easily, moisturizes well
reviews.reviewText: My husband normally hates lotion because sometimes it doesn't absorb well, smells too feminine, or leaves his skin feeling "squishy", especially between fingers. However, he uses his hands a lot for work and they have taken a beating over the years. The skin on his fingers and palms have gotten dry and cracked from all of the physical work he does on a daily basis.The Every Man Jack lotion pumps are masculine and uniquely shaped He really appreciated the pump dispenser instead of a squeeze tube. It's easy to just pump, apply, and go.The consistency is thin and easy to spread over your skin. It is definitely not a super thick lotion which makes it perfect for applying to hands. (doesn't leave them feeling coated and greasy)The fragrance is on the stronger side. If you like the scent of sandalwood, you will probably like this. The sandalwood is VERY prominent! It does have a somewhat woody, masculine vibe going on but I think some women would probably enjoy the fragrance, too. I used it on my legs after shaving just to try it out and didn't care for the fragrance. It was a little too masculine for my personal tastes.It is moisturizing without feeling heavy or sticky as long as you don't apply too much. When I tried it on my hands and only used a little, it absorbed well. When I dispensed too much and applied it to my legs, it took awhile to fully absorb. My legs stayed tacky longer than I would have liked. I used less the next time and I didn't have that problem. So, a little really does go a long way!My husband said that the moisturizing benefits lasted him all day, even when working, sweating, exercising, etc. My legs are on the drier side and the lotion did a good job of keeping them moisturized and itch free throughout the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisture Without the Grease
reviews.reviewText: Every Man Jack's Hand & Body Lotion in Amber + Sandalwood is a good option for those wanting to smell good without feeling oily. I've used their body wash before and really liked it and was excited to try this lotion. It's lightweight, absorbs fast, and leaves your skin feeling nourished thanks to natural ingredients like aloe and coconut oil. The scent is masculine, with a woodsy, spicy touch that's not overpowering. I like that it doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy, making it perfect for everyday use. Definitely recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smell like a husband with Every Man Jack's lotion
reviews.reviewText: My wife's only comment on this lotion is that it makes me smell like a husband, which I'll take as a compliment :D I enjoy the sandalwood scent myself. Once applied, the smell seems to last at least 12 hours which is very nice. The lotion itself is lightweight, not much more oily compared to Aveeno or Vasoline. That makes it easy to spread on the skin without excess lotion that you have to work hard to rub in. The packaging is convenient too and fits easily in my night stand. Great product overall and shoutout to the non-animal testing label.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice light scent
reviews.reviewText: I like this lotion because it’s not an overly strong scent, nor does it smell too “manly”. I ditched chemicals like sulfates, phthalates, and paraben a decade ago so I’m glad to have options like this for my husband. He has been using it daily and seems happy with it. It absorbs quickly and isn’t greasy or sticky at all. We will buy Everyman Jack again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The lotion works really well so I recommend it but with this caveat, it is not a masculine smell as one reviewer stated, After a few minutes it has like a hint of vanilla smell. Thats ok if you like that smell, I was looking for a woodsy smell. So I have 2 big bottles to use up. The efficacy of the skin softener is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lotion smells a little funky to me? It's also not very hydrating either, but my husband prefers that's since he doesn't like to feel overwhelmingly greasy. He says all my lotions are too thick and this one is a better consistency to him that absorbs better. It is a 2 pack, but one of the pumps came broken and won't pump, so we'll just have to switch the broken one, with the working one when the time comes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cis men with fragile masculinity can rejoice with this targeted lotion. The ingredients are good, the natural coconut and shea smells accompanied by warm wood scent. If you wear a similar fragrance it can work with it but if you wear something else it may clash. It doesn't project like a good cologne does, you'd have to get close.It's a lighter lotion, a thin but not watery consistency, that absorbs pretty well. A little goes a long way. It can feel greasy if you use too much. It gets rid of ashiness instantly. It's the dry winter season right now, and this is great to counteract that.
